benchmark_details.name: ViSa
benchmark_details.overview: ViSa is a large dataset for benchmarking the video subtitle extraction task, containing a total of 2.5M videos for pre-training, 230K for supervised fine-tuning, and 1.6K for testing.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To support and benchmark the task of end-to-end video subtitle extraction.

data.source: The dataset was constructed from the CNVid and MovieChat datasets.
data.annotation: Each video is annotated with subtitle text tracking and recognition.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on predicted subtitles against ground truth.
methodology.interpretation: Lower Normalized Edit Distance and SubER indicate better performance in subtitle extraction.
